name: william
text: so wait, is this strip what marmadukeexplained is referencing or are they both referencing something even more obscure?

name: catachresis
text: A comment left by catachresis was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by scriblerus, Sweetlips, shoinan, Dainbramage, STUART)

name: rowboat
text: If there is any connection, it is without a doubt Joe Mathlete ripping this off. Marmaduke Explained is pretty damn funny, but seriously, the guy's bread and butter is finding things that other people have already done (good and bad) and just throwing his Hateful Nerd Spin on it.

name: heyoo
text: Please Remember Me as: Rolling On The Floor, Laughing My Ass Off.

name: clintisiceman
text: That is how I will always think of Blonde On Blonde-era Bob Dylan.

name: goosey
text:
I regularly use D2BaD as an excuse for not continuing with internet arguments.

By which I mean I don't, but I should.

name: prettyrad
text: D2BaD was my quit message on IRC for quite a while. Just to remind myself that I have a bizarre sense of humour.

name: dasilodavi
text: I enjoyed Ray's advice column, but after a while it did kind of drag.

name: themacktruck
text: I appreciate Ray going the extra mile for the little _ to really nail his signature.

name: laserblade
text: "D2BaD" completely ripped the laughter out of me.

name: pogo
text: So I guess those twelve-year-olds then came over here to talk about the booze they have never drunk and the girls they wish they could boff.

name: aliiis
text: Incidentally, my dentist D2BaF (decided to become a farmer), which freaked me out a little bit. Serious - seven years of dentist school, then he practised for a year or two, which included pulling a nerve out of my wisdom tooth (it was the worst thing in the world), then went to be a farmer in Ireland.

name: greenkoolayd
text: wait... you mean like, the person you were romantically involved with?

name: hellofditties
text:
I bought this up to a 3.8

Because.. what the hell people. Seriously.

name: zapatos
text:
lol lyke srzly guys, itz so a 5.

fangz evryone.

name: koremora
text: This strip gloriously reminds me of trying to instant message my father.
